name: Just Dance: Summer Party
summary: Another entry in the Just Dance series on the Nintendo Wii, Summer Party includes over 21 new songs to dance to.

esrb.synopsis: This is a dancing simulation game in which players perform dance steps by following the movements of on-screen characters. Players score points by accurately moving their bodies in time with the music and scrolling indicators. One song contains the word “hell”'; other songs include mildly suggestive lyrics (e.g., “Kiss me here, touch me there, hanky-panky,” “I'll make you hot,” and “Don't like his baggy jeans, but I'ma like what's underneath them.”).
